go_data.justification: TIMM21 interacts with the TIM23 core complex and is involved in the assembly of oxidative phosphorylation complexes.
TIMM21 is associated with the mitochondrial presequence translocase and the mitochondrial translation regulation assembly intermediate of cytochrome c oxidase (MITRAC).

TIMM21 shuttles between TIM23 and the mitochondrial translation regulation assembly intermediate of cytochrome c oxidase (MITRAC), and is involved in the sorting machinery that links protein import to respiratory chain assembly.
